name: The Voice
description: The most popular music show in the world is coming to your living room. Sing and sway to the official music videos of your favourite artists, including Justin Bieber, Olly Murs, Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars, Queen and many more. Demonstrate your talent to the coaches and rock the audience. Don’t have a mic? No problem, turn your smartphone into a wireless microphone by downloading the free iOS or Android-compatible ‘Sing&Play Mic’ app. Or use a USB compatible microphone to play; it’s your choice!
